Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temp. rerouted via LaSalle Dr, Outer Lake Shore Dr, and exit at Oak to Michigan at Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via LaSalle Dr, Outer Lake Shore Dr, and exit at Oak to Michigan,  due to street blockage near Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Correction: #76 Diversey Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Diversey/Laramie-LeClaire
ShortDescription: Eastbound 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey,Laramie, Fullerton, Cicero, and Diversey near Diversey/Laramie-LeClaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Correction: Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey,Laramie, Fullerton, Cicero, and Diversey near Diversey/Laramie-LeClaire.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays at Cermak-Chinatown Affecting Red Line Service
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are experiencing a delay at Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are experiencing a delay at Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service and we hope to resume service shortly.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the Green Line, nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Updates will be posted as new information becomes available.

Allow extra travel time.
